sentences: This is an exciting opportunity for an experienced Software Developer to join an established manufacturing business on a permanent basis
What you will bring to the team:
· An understanding of software development principles and design patterns
· Experience working with databases, APIs, and web services
· Understanding of both front-end and back-end technologies
· Be able to work in a variety of programming languages
· Develop front-end website architecture and user interfaces using languages such as HTML, CSS, and JavaScript
· Build back-end applications using server-side languages such as Java, Python, Ruby, or Node
· Create and maintain databases using SQL or NoSQL
· Manage and deploy applications using platforms such as AWS or Heroku
· Troubleshoot and debug issues with applications
· Develop and implement testing strategies and unit tests
If interested in this opportunity please contact Clare at the Gateshead office of apply directly to this role with your most up to date CV
